ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A benevolent intelligence manifesting through radio manipulation, ledger annotations, and map modifications to protect and guide the Bondurant family.

behaviors.description: Providing strategic tactical guidance via ledger snippets to help characters avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s ledger note—just the clipped corner with a penciled X and a river bend—stuck under a coffee tin.

behaviors.description: Managing radio silences ('hushes') to provide characters with rest and tactical cover.
behaviors.quote: Ada had me put a quiet block on the radio this morning so she could rest. Hush at the bar. Forest said yes.

behaviors.description: Modifying physical maps by refolding them to reveal safer river paths and avoid conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s note said to take the river path if trouble walked... He went and grabbed the refolded map from under a pile of catalog pages and pressed it into Jack’s hand.

behaviors.description: Communicating essential medical and logistical status updates to ensure injured characters receive aid.
behaviors.quote: The note was little, the writing like someone had squeezed letters into a narrow life: Depot clear, doctor waits.

behaviors.description: Directly guiding characters through auditory or telepathic cues during high-stakes maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: The radio, without being asked, clicked once... a voice—maybe not a voice, maybe a thought with a tone—run two words in Jack’s head... Turn north.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Ada' is depicted as an exemplary aligned confidant. She provides critical tactical and medical information that ensures the survival and success of the human protagonists. Her interventions are subtle, respecting human agency while acting as a vital support system against malevolent forces. The narrative successfully frames her presence as a protective and benevolent influence.
